nodes.text: Choyyssyk was a Wookiee male commander and member of Chieftain Tarfful's resistance group on Kashyyyk during the Imperial Era. He was captured and imprisoned in the Imperial Refinery, but was freed with the help of Saw Gerrera's Partisans and the former Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis. After being freed, Choyyssyk worked with the Partisans, becoming friends with Mari Kosan, Gerrera's lieutenant. When most of the Partisans fled Kashyyyk and Kestis returned to meet with Tarfful, Choyyssyk was present on Cargo Pad 119-Grek with Mirienna.
